Text area

Example

Describe your project. Tell us the aim of the project and what you want to achieve. Use up to 1000 characters, which is about 200 words.

50 characters remaining

    Usage notes

    A textarea allows a user to enter multiple lines of text. Make the height of a textarea proportional to the amount of text to be entered and tell the user the maximum text you expect them to write. Use a word count below the text area to show the user how many characters are remaining of the limit.
